Title: Heroes of the Shado-Pan
Description: You said that Taran Zhu is in Townlong and was asking for me?  Must be something important...
ObjectivesText: Return with Hawkmaster Nurong to Taran Zhu at Rensai's Watchpost.
RewardText: I like that I can always depend on you. You have the spirit of a true Shado-Pan.
